div.head: Add to MOspace
div.p: Faculty, staff, students and other individuals or entities affiliated or associated with the University of Missouri are encouraged to submit works to MOspace. Works co-authored by those not affiliated with the university are accepted.

Authors can submit works directly to mospace@missouri.edu. PDF is the preferred format for documents, but most electronic formats are accepted for submission. For more information, call 573-882-1685 or email mospace@missouri.edu. We look forward to receiving your submissions.
Missouri S&T authors who wish to submit content to Scholars' Mine should visit the Submitting Content section of the Library Guide to Scholars' Mine.
